events.name: activate
events.text: Fires whenever item within the Container is activated.

items.name: newActiveItem
items.text: The new active item within the container.

items.name: oldActiveItem
items.text: The old active item within the container.

events.name: activeItemchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!activeItem}` changes.

events.name: added
events.text: Fires after a Component had been added to a Container.

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item within the Container.

events.name: beforeactiveItemchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!activeItem}` changes.

events.name: beforebottomchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!bottom}` changes.

events.name: beforecenteredchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!centered}` changes.

events.name: beforecomplete
events.text:
Fires after a change has been made to the field, but before the change is reflected in the
underlying field.  Saving the change to the field can be canceled by returning false from
the handler of this event. Note that if the value has not changed and ignoreNoChange = true,
the editing will still end but this event will not fire since no edit actually occurred.

items.name: The
items.text: location where actionable mode was successfully started

events.name: beforedisabledchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!disabled}` changes.

events.name: beforedockedchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!docked}` changes.

events.name: beforeedit
events.text:
Fires before row editing is triggered. Return `false` from event handler to prevent
the editing.

This event is only fired if the {@link Ext.grid.rowedit.Plugin} plugin is
configured on the grid.

events.name: beforegroupcollapse
events.text: Fires before a group collapse starts. Return `false` to cancel the collapse.

events.name: beforegroupexpand
events.text: Fires before a group expand starts. Return `false` to cancel the expand.

events.name: beforeheightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!height}` changes.

events.name: beforehiddenchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!hidden}` changes.

events.name: beforehide
events.text: Fires before the Component is hidden. Hide may be vetoed by returning `false` from a handler.

events.name: beforeleftchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!left}` changes.

events.name: beforemaxHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxHeight}` changes.

events.name: beforemaxWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxWidth}` changes.

events.name: beforeminHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minHeight}` changes.

events.name: beforeminWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minWidth}` changes.

events.name: beforeorientationchange
events.text: Fires before orientation changes.

events.name: beforerightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!right}` changes.

events.name: beforescrollablechange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!scrollable}` changes.

events.name: beforeselectionextend
events.text:
An event fired when an extension block is extended
using a drag gesture. Only fired when the grid's
`{@link Ext.grid.Grid.selectable #cfg!selectable}` is configured with the
{@link Ext.grid.selection.Model#cfg!extensible extensible} config.

items.name: An
items.text:
object which encapsulates a contiguous
selection block.

items.name: extension
items.text: An object describing the type and size of extension.

items.name: start
items.text:
The start (top left) cell of the
extension area.

items.name: end
items.text:
The end (bottom right) cell of the
extension area.

items.name: columns
items.text:
The number of columns extended (-ve means on
the left side).

items.name: rows
items.text:
The number of rows extended (-ve means on the top
side).

events.name: beforeshow
events.text: Fires before the Component is shown. Show may be vetoed by returning `false` from a handler.

events.name: beforestartedit
events.text:
Fires when editing is initiated, but before the value changes.  Editing can be canceled by
returning false from the handler of this event.

items.name: boundEl
items.text: The underlying element bound to this editor

items.name: The
items.text: location where actionable mode was successfully started

events.name: beforestorechange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!store}` changes.

events.name: beforetofront
events.text: Fires before a {@link #cfg!floated #cfg-floated} component is brought to the front of the visual stack.

events.name: beforetopchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!top}` changes.

events.name: beforewidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!width}` changes.

events.name: blur
events.text: Fires when this Component's {@link #property!focusEl #focusEl} loses focus.

events.name: bottomchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!bottom}` changes.

events.name: canceledit
events.text: Fires after editing has been canceled and the editor's value has been reset.

items.name: value
items.text: The user-entered field value that was discarded

items.name: startValue
items.text:
The original field value that was set back into the editor after
cancel

events.name: canceledit
events.text:
Fires when the user started editing but then cancelled the edit.

This event is only fired if the {@link Ext.grid.rowedit.Plugin} plugin is
configured on the grid.

events.name: cellselection
events.text: Fires when cell selection is being used and cells are selected or deselected.

items.name: selection
items.text:
An object which encapsulates the
selected cell range(s).

events.name: centeredchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!centered}` changes.

events.name: childdoubletap
events.text: Fires when a child is double tapped.

events.name: childlongpress
events.text: Fires when a child is long-pressed.

events.name: childmouseenter
events.text: Fires when the mouse pointer enters a child.

events.name: childmouseleave
events.text: Fires when the mouse pointer leaves a child.

events.name: childsingletap
events.text: Fires when a child is single tapped.

events.name: childtap
events.text: Fires when a child is tapped.

events.name: childtaphold
events.text: Fires when a child is tap-held.

events.name: childtouchcancel
events.text: Fires when a touch is cancelled.

events.name: childtouchend
events.text: Fires when a touch ends on a child.

events.name: childtouchmove
events.text: Fires when a touch move occurs on a child.

events.name: childtouchstart
events.text: Fires when a child is first touched.

events.name: columnadd
events.text: Fires whenever a column is added to the Grid.

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the added column.

events.name: columnhide
events.text: Fires whenever a column is hidden in the Grid.

events.name: columnmenucreated
events.text:
Fired when a column first creates its column menu. This is to allow plugins
to access and manipulate the column menu.

There will be the two sort items, and a column hide/show item with a child menu of
checkboxes. After this, developers may add custom enu items.

Menu items may be configured with a `{@link #cfg!weight weight}` config, and those with the lowest weight
gravitate to the top.

The sort ascending, sort descending, and hide columns items have weight -3, -2, and -1

events.name: columnmove
events.text: Fires whenever a column is moved in the grid.

items.name: fromIndex
items.text: The index the column was moved from.

items.name: toIndex
items.text: The index the column was moved to.

events.name: columnremove
events.text: Fires whenever a column is removed from the Grid.

events.name: columnresize
events.text: Fires whenever a column is resized in the Grid.

events.name: columnselection
events.text: Fires when column selection is being used and columns are selected or deselected.

items.name: selection
items.text:
An object which encapsulates the
selected columns.

events.name: columnshow
events.text: Fires whenever a column is shown in the Grid.

events.name: columnsort
events.text: Fires whenever a column is sorted in the Grid.

items.name: direction
items.text:
The direction of the sort on this Column. Either 'asc'
or 'desc'.

events.name: complete
events.text:
Fires after editing is complete and any changed value has been written to the underlying
field.

items.name: The
items.text: location where actionable mode was successfully started

events.name: deactivate
events.text: Fires whenever item within the Container is deactivated.

items.name: oldActiveItem
items.text: The old active item within the container.

items.name: newActiveItem
items.text: The new active item within the container.

events.name: deselect
events.text: Fires whenever an item is deselected

events.name: destroy
events.text: Fires when the component is destroyed

events.name: disabledchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!disabled}` changes.

events.name: disclose
events.text: Fires whenever a disclosure is handled

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item disclosed

events.name: dockedchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!docked}` changes.

events.name: edit
erased
events.text:
Fires when the component is no longer displayed in the DOM.  Listening to this event will
degrade performance not recommend for general use.

events.name: floatingchange
events.text: Fires whenever there is a change in the positioned status of a component

items.name: positioned
items.text:
The component's new positioned state. This becomes
`true` is a component is positioned using the {@link #cfg!top #cfg-top}, {@link #cfg!right #cfg-right},
{@link #cfg!bottom #cfg-bottom} or {@link #cfg!left #cfg-left} configs.

events.name: focus
events.text: Fires when this Component's {@link #property!focusEl #focusEl} receives focus.

events.name: focusenter
events.text: Fires when focus enters this Component's hierarchy.

events.name: focusleave
events.text: Fires when focus leaves this Component's hierarchy.

events.name: fullscreen
events.text: Fires whenever a Component with the fullscreen config is instantiated

events.name: groupcollapse
events.text: Fires when a group collapse starts.

events.name: groupexpand
events.text: Fires when a group expand starts.

events.name: heightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!height}` changes.

events.name: hiddenchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!hidden}` changes.

events.name: hide
events.text: Fires whenever the Component is hidden

events.name: initialize
events.text: Fires when the component has been initialized

events.name: itemaction
events.text: Fires whenever a swipe action has been triggered from a list item.

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the swipped item.

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item.

events.name: itemdoubletap
events.text: Fires whenever an item is doubletapped

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item doubletapped

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemlongpress
events.text: Fires whenever an item's longpress event fires

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item touched

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemmouseenter
events.text: Fires whenever the mouse pointer moves over an item

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemmouseleave
events.text: Fires whenever the mouse pointer leaves an item

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemsingletap
events.text: Fires whenever an item is singletapped

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item singletapped

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemswipe
events.text: Fires whenever an item is swiped

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item swiped

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemtap
events.text:
Fires whenever an item is tapped. Add `x-item-no-tap` CSS class to a child of list
item to suppress `{@link #event!itemtap itemtap}` events on that child. This can be useful when items
contain components such as Buttons.

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item tapped

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemtaphold
events.text: Fires whenever an item's taphold event fires

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item touched

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemtouchcancel
events.text: Fires whenever an item touch is cancelled

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item touched

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemtouchend
events.text: Fires whenever an item is touched

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item touched

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemtouchmove
events.text: Fires whenever an item is moved

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item moved

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: itemtouchstart
events.text: Fires whenever an item is touched

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item touched

items.name: record
items.text: The record associated to the item

events.name: leftchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!left}` changes.

events.name: maxHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxHeight}` changes.

events.name: maxWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxWidth}` changes.

events.name: minHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minHeight}` changes.

events.name: minWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minWidth}` changes.

events.name: moved
events.text: Fires when a component si moved within its Container.

items.name: toIndex
items.text: The new index of the item.

items.name: fromIndex
items.text: The old index of the item.

events.name: navigate
events.text:
Fires whenever the user navigates to a new location.

In regular dataviews, a location encapsulates one view item, and its associated record.

In grids, a location encapsulates one cell, and its associated data field.

items.name: from
items.text: The location where navigation came from.

events.name: orientationchange
events.text: Fires when orientation changes.

events.name: painted
events.text:
Fires whenever this Element actually becomes visible (painted) on the screen. This is
useful when you need to perform 'read' operations on the DOM element, i.e: calculating
natural sizes and positioning.

__Note:__ This event is not available to be used with event delegation. Instead `{@link #event!painted painted}`
only fires if you explicitly add at least one listener to it, for performance reasons.

events.name: positionedchange
events.text: Fires whenever there is a change in the positioned status of a component

items.name: positioned
items.text:
The component's new positioned state. This becomes
`true` is a component is positioned using the {@link #cfg!top #cfg-top}, {@link #cfg!right #cfg-right},
{@link #cfg!bottom #cfg-bottom} or {@link #cfg!left #cfg-left} configs.

events.name: refresh
events.text: Fires whenever the DataView is refreshed

events.name: removed
events.text: Fires when a component is removed from a Container

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item that was removed.

events.name: renderedchange
events.text:
Fires whenever an item is rendered into a container or derendered
from a Container.

items.name: rendered
items.text: The current rendered status of the item.

events.name: resize
events.text:
Important note: For the best performance on mobile devices, use this only when you
absolutely need to monitor a Element's size.

__Note:__ This event is not available to be used with event delegation. Instead `{@link #event!resize resize}`
only fires if you explicitly add at least one listener to it, for performance reasons.

events.name: rightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!right}` changes.

events.name: scrollablechange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!scrollable}` changes.

events.name: select
events.text: Fires whenever an item is selected

items.name: selected
items.text:
The selected record(s). If {@link #cfg!selectable #selectable} {@link Ext.dataview.selection.Model#cfg!mode mode}
is `single`, this will be a single {@link Ext.data.Model}. If
{@link Ext.dataview.selection.Model#cfg!mode mode} is `simple` or `multi`, this will be an array
of {@link Ext.data.Model}.

events.name: selectionextenderdrag
events.text:
An event fired when an extension block is dragged to encompass
a new range. Only fired when the grid's `{@link Ext.grid.Grid.selectable #cfg!selectable}`
is configured with the {@link Ext.grid.selection.Model#cfg!extensible extensible} config.

items.name: An
items.text:
object which encapsulates a contiguous
selection block.

items.name: extension
items.text: An object describing the type and size of extension.

items.name: overCell
items.text: The grid cell over which the mouse is being dragged.

items.name: start
items.text: The start (top left) cell of the extension area.

items.name: end
items.text: The end (bottom right) cell of the extension area.

items.name: columns
items.text:
The number of columns extended (-ve means on the
left side).

items.name: rows
items.text: The number of rows extended (-ve means on the top side).

events.name: show
events.text: Fires whenever the Component is shown

events.name: specialkey
events.text:
Fires when any key related to navigation (arrows, tab, enter, esc, etc.) is pressed. You can
check
{@link Ext.event.Event#method!getKey Ext.event.Event#getKey} to determine which key was pressed.

items.name: field
items.text: The field attached to this editor

events.name: startedit
events.text: Fires when this editor is displayed

items.name: boundEl
items.text: The underlying element bound to this editor

items.name: The
items.text: location where actionable mode was successfully started

events.name: storechange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!store}` changes.

events.name: tofront
events.text:
Fires when a {@link #cfg!floated #cfg-floated} component has been brought to the front of the visual
stack.

events.name: topchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!top}` changes.

events.name: updatedata
events.text: Fires whenever the data of the component is updated

events.name: validateedit
widthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!width}` changes.
